faq.question: How can I join the ICPC USC Community?
faq.answer: Students from USC can join by attending our weekly training sessions or contacting us via email. No prior competitive programming experience is required - we welcome beginners!

faq.question: What is the training schedule?
faq.answer: We conduct training sessions twice a week: Tuesdays for beginners/intermediate level and Saturdays for advanced topics. Sessions run from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM.

faq.question: Are there any requirements to participate?
faq.answer: The only requirement is enthusiasm for problem-solving and algorithms. We provide training for all skill levels, from complete beginners to advanced programmers.

faq.question: How do I qualify for ECPC/ACPC teams?
faq.answer: Team selection is based on performance in our internal contests and training sessions. We typically select the top performers to represent USC in regional and international competitions.
